DOC.brief_summary: To prospectively evaluate postoperative visual refractive parameter series subject bilaterally implant AcrySof ReSTOR +3 vs. bilaterally implant LENTIS MPlus Intraocular Lens ( IOL ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Visual Function After Bilateral Implantation Presbyopia Correcting Intraocular Lenses
